author: Ground News
title: Ground News - NCPD investigating shooting on Fairwind Drive
text:
Summary by Ground News Authorities in North Charleston are investigating a shooting near an apartment complex. Officers were responding to an address off Fairwind Drive around 3:40 p.m. The apartment complex is located off Otranto Road. Details were limited. Keep checking counton2.com for updates. WCBD Center High Factuality Media Conglomerate: Nexstar Media Group NCPD investigating shooting on Fairwind Drive NORTH CHARLESTON, S.C. (WCBD) - Authorities in North Charleston are investigating a shooting near an apartment complex Thursday afternoon. Officials with the North Charleston Police Department (NCPD) said officers were responding to an address off Fairwind Drive around 3:40 p.m. The apartment complex is located off Otranto Road. Details were limited. Keep checking counton2.com for updates.
2 hours ago · Charleston, United States Read Full Article
